# 应用智能运维实战（试读版）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban
yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban
yingyong-zhineng-yunwei-shizhan-shidu-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
